languages.text: "В лабиринте чуждого мира вереницей вершится месть: око за око. Пролитая кровь тех, что зрит, несет за собой возмездие тех, кто ослеп. А на запах бежит кровожадный зверь, оскверненно скалясь. Его укрощение мнимо и приводит к распутью — стереть зараженную кровь, самому ей упиться или окрасить землю в багряный".

traits.locale_text: "В лабиринте чуждого мира вереницей вершится месть: око за око. Пролитая кровь тех, что зрит, несет за собой возмездие тех, кто ослеп. А на запах бежит кровожадный зверь, оскверненно скалясь. Его укрощение мнимо и приводит к распутью — стереть зараженную кровь, самому ей упиться или окрасить землю в багряный".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."
languages.original_text: "В лабиринте чуждого мира вереницей вершится месть: око за око. Пролитая кровь тех, что зрит, несет за собой возмездие тех, кто ослеп. А на запах бежит кровожадный зверь, оскверненно скалясь. Его укрощение мнимо и приводит к распутью — стереть зараженную кровь, самому ей упиться или окрасить землю в багряный".

languages.text: “在某个陌生世界的迷宫里，复仇的队伍正在游行，渴望以眼还眼。看到真相的人血溅四处，而那些遭到蒙蔽的人则会招致报复。在鲜血的吸引下，一头生病的野兽跑了过来，露齿狂啸。它的驯服仅仅是假象，它会将你带到十字路口。要么洗净毒血，欢声雷动，要么将大地染成一片血红。”
languages.original_text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."

traits.locale_text: “在某个陌生世界的迷宫里，复仇的队伍正在游行，渴望以眼还眼。看到真相的人血溅四处，而那些遭到蒙蔽的人则会招致报复。在鲜血的吸引下，一头生病的野兽跑了过来，露齿狂啸。它的驯服仅仅是假象，它会将你带到十字路口。要么洗净毒血，欢声雷动，要么将大地染成一片血红。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."

languages.text: «En el laberinto de un mundo extraño, la venganza se sirve en procesión: ojo por ojo. La sangre derramada de aquellos que ven provoca la venganza contra los cegados. Y, atraída por el olor, una bestia enfermiza llega al trote, enseñando los dientes. Su domesticación es una farsa y conduce a una encrucijada: lavar la sangre envenenada, disfrutar de ella o empapar la tierra de escarlata».
languages.original_text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."

traits.locale_text: «En el laberinto de un mundo extraño, la venganza se sirve en procesión: ojo por ojo. La sangre derramada de aquellos que ven provoca la venganza contra los cegados. Y, atraída por el olor, una bestia enfermiza llega al trote, enseñando los dientes. Su domesticación es una farsa y conduce a una encrucijada: lavar la sangre envenenada, disfrutar de ella o empapar la tierra de escarlata».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「見知らぬ惑星の迷宮では、復讐が行列をなして行われるわ。目には目を。目が見える者の流した血は、目が見えなくなった者への復讐につながる。その匂いに引き寄せられ、病んだ獣が歯をむき出して走ってくる。飼い慣らしたと思ってもそれは見せかけで、あなたは岐路に立たされる。毒の血を洗い流すか、その血に酔いしれるか、それとも大地を緋色に染めるか」
languages.original_text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."

traits.locale_text: 「見知らぬ惑星の迷宮では、復讐が行列をなして行われるわ。目には目を。目が見える者の流した血は、目が見えなくなった者への復讐につながる。その匂いに引き寄せられ、病んだ獣が歯をむき出して走ってくる。飼い慣らしたと思ってもそれは見せかけで、あなたは岐路に立たされる。毒の血を洗い流すか、その血に酔いしれるか、それとも大地を緋色に染めるか」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Im Labyrinth einer fremden Welt wird Rache streng nach Folge geübt: Auge um Auge. Das vergossene Blut der Sehenden führt zur Rache gegen die Geblendete. Und vom Geruch angelockt kommt eine kranke Bestie gerannt und fletscht die Zähne. Ihre Zähmung ist ein Betrug und führt zu einer Weggabelung — soll man das vergiftete Blut auswaschen, sich darin suhlen oder die Erde rot färben?"
languages.original_text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."

traits.locale_text: "Im Labyrinth einer fremden Welt wird Rache streng nach Folge geübt: Auge um Auge. Das vergossene Blut der Sehenden führt zur Rache gegen die Geblendete. Und vom Geruch angelockt kommt eine kranke Bestie gerannt und fletscht die Zähne. Ihre Zähmung ist ein Betrug und führt zu einer Weggabelung — soll man das vergiftete Blut auswaschen, sich darin suhlen oder die Erde rot färben?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Dans le labyrinthe d'un monde étrange, la vengeance est un cortège : œil pour œil. Le sang versé par ceux qui voient pousse à se venger de ceux qui ont été aveuglés. Attirée par l'odeur, une créature sanguinaire arrive en courant, les crocs à découvert. Son apprivoisement n'est qu'une imposture et mène à un carrefour : laver le sang empoisonné, s'en repaître ou imbiber la terre d'écarlate. »
languages.original_text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."

traits.locale_text: « Dans le labyrinthe d'un monde étrange, la vengeance est un cortège : œil pour œil. Le sang versé par ceux qui voient pousse à se venger de ceux qui ont été aveuglés. Attirée par l'odeur, une créature sanguinaire arrive en courant, les crocs à découvert. Son apprivoisement n'est qu'une imposture et mène à un carrefour : laver le sang empoisonné, s'en repaître ou imbiber la terre d'écarlate. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Tuhaf bir dünyanın labirentinde intikam sırayla yerini buluyor. Göze göz, dişe diş. Görenlerin dökülen kanları, görmeyenlere karşı intikam yeminleri ettiriyor. Dökülen kanların kokusu, hastalıklı bir yaratığı çekiyor. Dişlerini göstererek koşa koşa geliyor. Ehlileştirildiği yalanı, seni yol ayrımına sürüklüyor. İster zehirli kanı yıka, ister bundan keyif al istersen de toprağı kızıla boya. Seçim senin."
languages.original_text: "In the labyrinth of a strange world, vengeance is served in procession: an eye for an eye. The spilt blood of those who see leads to revenge against those who were blinded. And drawn by the scent, a sickened beast comes running, baring its teeth. Its taming is a sham and leads to a crossroads — wash out the poisoned blood, revel in it, or soak the earth in scarlet."
